issue.title: [C++] Add option to convert a particular column to timestamps or dates using a passed strptime-compatible string
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3739](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3739). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Probably will need something like

```Java

...
types={'date_col': csv.convert_date('%Y%m%d')}
```
